name: NETXP LINUX Generic Linux kernel module loading
description: Rule is designed to monitor and log activities related to the loading and unloading of kernel modules. This helps in identifying potentially malicious activities or unauthorized changes to the kernel's module configuration. The generated audit events assist in tracking module-related actions on the system. It tracks using binaries like: insmod, modprobe, rmmod and kernel logs including: finit_module, init_module, delete_module
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "*modules*" and
any where event.module: "auditd"
